title: Miss Fortune has to be one of the most underrated champions
body:
Never have I ever witnessed people saying a champ is such trash to the point of saying that she is more unplayable than Urgot before buffs, when in reality she is no where near as bad as people make her out to be and has statistically always been in the top three of the marksman class in terms of win rates in solo queue, and was already starting to see play in the professional scene in Korea, where she had a positive win rate out of a handful of games, before the item meta changed to IE rush and the hyper carry crit carries took the spotlight as opposed to the classic old BT snowbally rush that hugely benefited early-mid game carries with power spikes through their high scaling on spells.

Now they have buffs put in to help out her mobility, utility, and they buffed her already strong and oppressive early game. {{champion:21}} will slay favorites, honeys. Not to mention she officially is the hottest female champ in-game now too. 

Hope you're ready. 8)

replies.body: That's because people here like to use low pick rates to say a champion is garbage.
as long as {{champion:119}} is here mf is shit because she is the worst version of draven

> [{quoted}](name=finkypop,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tqlXG536,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-09T18:56:57.341+0000)
>

lol no

> [{quoted}](name=Draveeeeeeeeeeen,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tqlXG536,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-09T18:57:12.025+0000)
>
> lol no

Mf outduels even Draven easily. Difference is as it stands MF the ONLY adc in teh game w/o any kind of defensive ability will get killed by anybody who jumps on her. That is the only reason she is bad.

> [{quoted}](name=finkypop,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tqlXG536,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-09T18:56:57.341+0000)
>
> You better believe it, honey.

let's do the math!

both with let's say just AAs and their respective damage steroids and or AA resets. (Draven's axes and MF's impure shots+Q reset)

1 AA from draven's axe at max rank=185% AD
1 AA from MF with no stacks of impure shots=106% AD
on 1st AA from MF, she AA resets with Q to make another AA, so that's 85% AD+12%AD from 2nd stack impure shots+ 118% form the AA reset=321% total ad+Q's base of 80
2nd AA from Draven=285% damage total
3rd MF AA= 445% damage
on 3rd AA, a good draven should have caught his axe so= 470% total damage at minimum.
4th MF AA= 575% damage
4th Draven Axe (considering he can recast it at this time and not sooner)=655% damage
5th MF AA=711% damage

I guess if MF is smart and can AA reset with Q she'd win the duel with no items or if she's ahead. However, almost 100% of MF's total damage output doesn't add up to Critical or Lifesteal calculations while all of Draven's damage does.
Her rack got nerfed hard though...

I love MF, just disappointed that GW was removed. I'll wait on my final opinion until after some hands on time with her changes on the PBE. As long as both AD/AP MF are playable without it feeling like a nerf, i'll adjust.
